text: Cary's negotiating position general
motors legal woes and McConnell's
political fight today on the New York
Times minute nothing justifies a
military intervention that the world has
witnessed John Kerry is off on a
last-ditch mission to stop Russia's
annexation of Crimea here's what he has
to offer the carrots guarantees not to
shut power to Russia's military base in
the area and increased autonomy for
Crimea the stick a pledge of sanctions
if Russia makes a move faulty ignition
switches are behind the recent General
Motors recall of more than 1.5 million
vehicles and GM knew about the problem
in 2001 but didn't address it that
question now is whether the automaker
disclosed the defect in its federally
backed bankruptcy if not that could send
GM back into bankruptcy he's blown the
Senate over 400 times Democrats are
aiming a lot of firepower at senate
minority leader mitch mcconnell but is
he really that vulnerable the short
answer no the defeat of an incumbent
Senate leader in a state that opposes
the president is nearly unprecedented
